The video shared on social media claimed: 2. The video was shared by a Facebook page called Narendra Modi fans from Karunadu, suggesting it was endorsed by supporters of the Indian Prime Minister.
Upon investigation: it was found that the video actually depicted a remote-controlled toy aircraft, not a real Rafale jet.
The toy aircraft seen in the video was i: 16QQ PNP model made by Flex Innovations, a company specializing in RC hobby products.
